review: I was admitted for a procedure. My experience was very pleasant right from admission till discharge. My procedure  was done by extremely professional Cardiologist Dr. Ashish. who made me very comfortable and kept me informed during & after the process. I never felt worried or scared. He even visited the ward before the discharged me personally explained to me the next course of treatment. I also must compliment the hospital administration & Ms Leena for cleanliness, coordination, and smooth process. I strongly recommend this Wockhardt Hospital Mira Road for Cardiology treatment.

Dr. Ashish Mishra is an outstanding cardiologist. The hospital experience was excellent, with attentive staff and modern facilities. Dr. Ashish's expertise and compassionate care made a significant difference. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a cardiologist in the mira bhayander area.
